text: The student will analyze and interpret artwork using art vocabulary.
subject: Visual Art
subs: Categorize works of art both real and imaginary, by subject matter, such as portrait, landscape, still life, and architecture.
Interpret ideas, opinions, and emotions expressed in personal and othersâ€™ works of art.

text: The student will express opinions with supporting statements regarding works of art.
subject: Visual Art

text: The student will describe skills needed to work collaboratively in an art community.
subject: Visual Art
subs: Share and take turns with art tools and materials.
